com.github.jochenw.afw.core.io

Interface DirectoryScanner.Context

  • Enclosing class:
    DirectoryScanner

    public static interface DirectoryScanner.Context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BasicFileAttributes getAttrs()
      Returns the current files attributes.
      Path getBaseDir()
      Returns the base directory, which is currently being scanned.
      Path getFile()
      Returns the path of a file, which has been detected within the base directory.
      String getUri()
      Returns the relative path of the file, within the base directory.

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseDir

        @Nonnull
Path getBaseDir()
        Returns the base directory, which is currently being scanned.
        Returns:
        The base directory, which is currently being scanned.

      • getAttrs

        @Nonnull
BasicFileAttributes getAttrs()
        Returns the current files attributes.
        Returns:
        The current files attributes.

      • getFile

        @Nonnull
Path getFile()
        Returns the path of a file, which has been detected within the base directory.
        Returns:
        Path of the current file.

      • getUri

        @Nonnull
String getUri()
        Returns the relative path of the file, within the base directory. The path is in a normalized form, using "/" as the separator, as is the case for a Unix file system.
        Returns:
        Relative path of the current file, in normalized form.
